summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3033 for the improvement of the alley in block 25, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 4, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36563 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
